"pgp6.5.3RSA1"
ID: 0x04500D4D
Type: RSA
Size: 2048
Created: 8/8/2003
Expires: Never
Cipher: IDEA
Fingerprint: F992 1DF7 42D4 8923  0757 8EF7 10B3 00C8

Created with PGP 6.5.3 on Windows 2000 Pro

Passphrase: test

Durnit.. The ASCII-armored signature wound up being signed by some
other key (6DF31F869E70A580), so I renamed it to

    sig.cleartext.notepad.pgp6.5.3.RSA1.asc.busted

..bummer.
